short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks the 'Show more items' and 'Continue searching for more matches online' links as they appear

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The 'Show more items' and 'Continue searching for more matches online' links in some versions of the Azure DevOps Boards UI need to be manually clicked multiple times after waiting for them to load in order to ensure that you are viewing all matching items. This extension automates the process so the user doesn't need to click dozens of times per day just to view their current sprint status in a large project.
